post.description:
Join the first publicly available session of given type. If there is no public session, and the session type
permits player made sessions, create a new session and put the player in it

Required Auth Permissions: `session:update:self`

Required Session Permissions: None

get.description:
Get Session by ID. This request will return limited results for non-members of the session, such as excluding info for 
how to connect to the instance. Elevated permissions can bypass that restriction

Required Auth Permissions: `session:read:self` for users requesting complete data about sessions they are in
`session:read:any` for users requesting complete data about sessions they are not in

Required Session Permissions: None for limited results. `SessionPermissions.active_in_session` to get complete results for users who do not have the `session:read:any` auth permission

patch.description:
Update session info by session id

Required Auth Permissions: `session:update:self` for users patching sessions they are in.
`session:update:any` for users patching sessions they are not in.

Required Session Permissions: `SessionPermissions.session_admin` for users who do not have the `session:update:any` auth permission

ETag.description: Used to identify this version of the content.  Provide with a get request to avoid downloading the same data multiple times.

post.description:
Register session in the public browser

Required Auth Permissions: `session:update:self` for users registering sessions they are in 
`session:update:any` for users registering any session

Required Session Permissions: `SessionPermissions.session_admin` if user does not have the `session:update:any` auth permission

delete.description:
Delete the session from the public browser

Required Auth Permissions: `session:update:self` for users deleting sessions they are in from the browser
`session:update:any` for users deleting any session from the browser

Required Session Permissions: `SessionPermissions.session_admin` if user does not have the `session:update:any` auth permission

patch.description:
Update the browser info for the session

Required Auth Permissions: `session:update:self` for users patching sessions they are in
`session:update:any` for users patching any session

Required Session Permissions: `SessionPermissions.session_admin` if user does not have the `session:update:any` auth permission

post.description:
Request an instance be spawned for the session, or register self as a host of the instance

Required Auth Permissions: `session:update:self` for users requesting instances for sessions they are in 
`session:update:any` for users requesting instances for any session
             
Required Session Permissions: `SessionPermissions.session_admin` if user does not have the `session:update:any` auth permission

delete.description:
Unregister the instance from the session.

Required Auth Permissions: `session:update:self` for users deleting instances for sessions they are in 
`session:update:any` for users deleting instances for any session
             
Required Session Permissions: `SessionPermissions.session_host` if user does not have the `session:update:any` auth permission

ETag.description: Used to identify this version of the content.  Provide with a get request to avoid downloading the same data multiple times.

patch.description:
Update info about the instance

Required Auth Permissions: `session:update:self` for users patching instances for sessions they are in 
`session:update:any` for users patching instances for any session
             
Required Session Permissions: `SessionPermissions.session_host` if user does not have the `session:update:any` auth permission

post.description:
Begin a new match for the current session, on the current instance

Required Auth Permissions: `session:update:self` for users starting matches for sessions they are in 
`session:update:any` for users starting matches for any session
             
Required Session Permissions: `SessionPermissions.session_admin` if user does not have the `session:update:any` auth permission

delete.description:
Unregister the match from the session.
               
Required Auth Permissions: `session:update:self` for users deleting matches for sessions they are in 
`session:update:any` for users deleting matches for any session
             
Required Session Permissions: `SessionPermissions.session_admin` if user does not have the `session:update:any` auth permission

patch.description:
Update info about a match

Required Auth Permissions: `session:update:self` for users patching matches for sessions they are in 
`session:update:any` for users patching matches for any session
             
Required Session Permissions: `SessionPermissions.session_admin` if user does not have the `session:update:any` auth permission

post.description:
Join a session with currently authed player

Required Session Permissions: None

Leave a session with currently authed player

post.description:
Add or invite a player to the session, or change the status of a player already in the session

Required Auth Permissions: `session:update:self` for users acting on themselves, or inviting to a session they are in
`session:update:any` for users acting on others, or sessions they are not in

Required Session Permissions: None if session is publicly joinable or the player has been invited. 
`SessionPermissions.session_admin` for other operations

ETag.description: Used to identify this version of the content.  Provide with a get request to avoid downloading the same data multiple times.

404.description: Session doesn't exist or Player is not a member of the session.  See error code for more info

delete.summary: Kick Player From Session By Uuid
delete.description:
Kick or Remove a player from a session, or cancel an invite for a player to the session

Required Auth Permissions: `session:update:self` for users operating on themselves or sessions they are in
`session:update:any` for operating on sessions the user is not in

Required Session Permissions: None for users operating on themselves. 
`SessionPermissions.session_admin` for operating on other players in your session

ETag.description: Used to identify this version of the content.  Provide with a get request to avoid downloading the same data multiple times.

404.description: Session doesn't exist or Player is not a member of the session.  See error code for more info

post.description:
Add or invite a player to the session, or change the status of a player already in the session

Required Auth Permissions: `session:update:self` for users acting on themselves, or inviting to a session they are in
`session:update:any` for users acting on others, or sessions they are not in

Required Session Permissions: None if session is publicly joinable or the player has been invited.
`SessionPermissions.session_admin` for other operations

**DEPRECATED** - Use the player/uuid endpoint instead

404.description: Session doesn't exist or Player is not a member of the session.  See error code for more info

delete.summary: Kick Player From Session By Id
delete.description:
Kick or Remove a player from a session, or cancel an invite for a player to the session

Required Auth Permissions: `session:update:self` for users operating on sessions they are in.
`session:update:any` for users operating on sessions they are not in

Required Session Permissions: None for players operating on themselves.
`SessionPermissions.session_admin` for operating on other players in your session

**DEPRECATED** - Use the player/uuid endpoint instead

404.description: Session doesn't exist or Player is not a member of the session.  See error code for more info

get.description:
Get all events for the session.  Empty list means there is no event history for it.

Required Auth Permissions: `session:read-event:active` for users getting events about sessions they are in.
`session:read-event:any` for users getting events about sessions they are not in

Required Session Permissions: `SessionPermissions.active_in_session` for users that do not have the `session:read-event:any` auth permission

post.description:
Create an event in the log for this session.
Internal session operations will create new events that are accessible from the get request.

Player clients and instances are expected to create events here when something occurs on their clients that is
relevant.

Required Auth Permissions: `session:update-event:active` for users posting events about sessions they are in.
`session:update-event:any` for users posting events about sessions they are not in

Required Session Permissions: `SessionPermissions.active_in_session` for users that do not have the `session:update-event:any` auth permission

404.description: Session doesn't exist.  See error code for more info

get.description:

Required Auth Permissions: `session:read:self` for users requesting data about platform sessions they are in
`session:read:any` for users requesting data about platform sessions they are not in

Required Session Permissions: `SessionPermissions.active_in_session` for users that do not have the `session:read:any` auth permission

404.description: Platform Session doesn't exist.  See error code for more info

get.description: Get all of the enabled regions and their configuration

double_args.title: Double Args
double_args.description: Additional double arguments to add to the matchmaking ticket

string_args.title: String Args
string_args.description: Additional string arguments to add to the matchmaking ticket

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Additional tags to add to the matchmaking ticket

extensions.title: Extensions
extensions.description: Additional extensions to add to the matchmaking ticket. Value is a base64 string representation of the protobuf binary data. The data will be converted back to binary before being put on the ticket

custom_data.title: Custom Data
custom_data.description: Custom data with the listing of the instance in the Session browser

cursor.title: Cursor
cursor.description: Cursor to continue iterating through browser sessions. 0 means we have returned the last entry

browser_sessions.title: Browser Sessions
browser_sessions.description: List of sessions in the browser

custom_data.title: Custom Data
custom_data.description: Custom data with the listing of the instance in the Session browser

platform_id.description: Which platform this client is one

input.description: Which input type this client is using

client_version.title: Client Version
client_version.description: String representation of semver for client

client_settings.title: Client Settings
client_settings.description: Which input type and platform the client is using

crossplay_preferences.title: Crossplay Preferences
crossplay_preferences.description: Client's desired crossplay settings to determine which other clients it can play with. If not defined, assumed to be as permissive as possible

session_type.title: Session Type
session_type.description: Type of session client is creating or joining

region_id.title: Region Id
region_id.description: Preferred region for the instance and match to take place in

permitted_platform.description: The platform type that the client is allowed to play with (any, xbox-like only, playstation-like only etc.)

permitted_input.description: The input type that the client is allowed to play with (keyboard and mouse, gamepad, touch input etc.)

instance_id.title: Instance Id
instance_id.description: ID for which instance was marked as FUBAR

error.title: Error
error.description: Error string describing what caused the instance failure

region.title: Region
region.description: What region the failed instance was in

matchmaking_profile_id.title: Matchmaking Profile Id
matchmaking_profile_id.description: ID for which matchmaking profile was used to generate the failed instance

instance_source_provider.description: Which instance provider allocated this failed instance

allocation_id.title: Allocation Id
allocation_id.description: Allocation ID for instance that's been spun up

instance_id.title: Instance Id
instance_id.description: Unique ID for the host/session relationship

host_player_id.title: Host Player Id
host_player_id.description: Player ID of the host, if the host type is player

host_player_uuid.title: Host Player Uuid
host_player_uuid.description: Player UUID of the host, if the host type is player

host_dedicated_process_id.title: Host Dedicated Process Id
host_dedicated_process_id.description: Unique ID for the process that is running this instance

host_dedicated_server_id.title: Host Dedicated Server Id
host_dedicated_server_id.description: Unique ID for the machine running the instance

join_status.description: Is the instance joinable at this time?

instance_startup_params.title: Instance Startup Params
instance_startup_params.description: Parameters used by the host to startup. For UE5 this will contain the map and gamemode

version.title: Version
version.description: Product Client Version number.  Used for compatibility checking with players

allocation_id.description: Allocation ID for instance that's been spun up

join_status.description: Is the instance joinable at this time?

version.description: Product Client Version number.  Used for compatibility checking with players.  Must be compatible with all players to spawn

x-enum-descriptions: Host is ready to accept players

instance_launch_template_id.description: ID to uniquely identify this instance launch template

map_selection_list.title: Map Selection List
map_selection_list.description: A selection list of maps that can be chosen to launch into

default_host_type.description: Default host type for this template. Can be overriden in instance requests

custom_data.title: Custom Data
custom_data.description: Custom data that will be passed to the session during the instance launch request

instance_id.title: Instance Id
instance_id.description: Unique ID for the instance, a new one will be generated if not provided

instance_startup_params.title: Instance Startup Params
instance_startup_params.description: Parameters used by the host to startup. For UE5 this will contain the map and gamemode

host_player_uuid.description: Player UUID of the host, if the host type is player

map.description: Name of the map for the instance to spawn with

mode.description: Game mode for the instance to spawn in

misc_params.title: Misc Params

custom_data.title: Custom Data
custom_data.description: Custom data to pass through to the instance

custom_data.title: Custom Data
custom_data.description: Custom data to join a instance

map_game_id.title: Map Game Id
map_game_id.description: ID to uniquely identify this map game

map_name.title: Map Name
map_name.description: Name of the map the instance should load into

mode.title: Mode
mode.description: Game mode for the instance to spawn in

selection_chance.title: Selection Chance
selection_chance.description: Chance that this map will get selected in a rotation list

custom_data.title: Custom Data
custom_data.description: Custom data to pass through to the instance

map_selection_list_id.title: Map Selection List Id
map_selection_list_id.description: ID to uniquely identify this map selection list

maps.title: Maps
maps.description: List of maps that can be chosen in this selection list

created.title: Time Zone Aware Datetime
created.description: Datetime that enforces that a timezone is given. Unix timestamps are allowed and forced into the UTC time zone

ticket_ids.title: Ticket Ids
ticket_ids.description: List of tickets that were assigned to this match if created by matchmaking

profile_id.title: Profile Id
profile_id.description: ID of the matchmaking profile to join

join_mode.description: What mode to set on the matchmaking profile (normal, backfill etc)

instance_launch_template_id.title: Instance Launch Template Id
instance_launch_template_id.description: Which instance template to use when launching a match in this profile

rules.title: Rules
rules.description: A list of the rules to be checked for this ruleset

determiner.description: Determiner of how many rules must be satisfied in this rulest (all, any, one, none)

teams.title: Teams
teams.description: List of teams that are to be invited to session

session_tickets.title: Session Tickets
session_tickets.description: List of sessions and tickets the match was made with. Used to verify this match should still be created

instance_launch_template_id.title: Instance Launch Template Id
instance_launch_template_id.description: Which launch template should be used to request an instance

region_id.title: Region Id
region_id.description: Region to start the instance in

match_id.title: Match Id
match_id.description: Unique ID for this generated match

host_player_uuid.title: Host Player Uuid
host_player_uuid.description: Player UUID of the host, if the host type is player

mmr_group_method.description: What method should be used to calculate a group's MMR based on the individual player's ranks

ruleset.title: Ruleset
ruleset.description: A set of rules that determine whether or not this matchmaking config should be used.

profiles.title: Profiles
profiles.description: A list of which match making profiles are going to be created on the ticket

template_group_id.title: Template Group Id
template_group_id.description: ID for this set of potential matchmaking templates

template_options.title: Template Options
template_options.description: List of the different matchmaking templates that could be used. The config is chosen based on a set of rules in each MatchMakingTemplate object. If there are no rules, it's the default template

required_item_ids.title: Required Item Ids
required_item_ids.description: Set of all the item ids that are required to validate every rule contained in this template group

ticket_id.title: Ticket Id
ticket_id.description: Unique ID for this attempt at matchmaking

platform_id.description: Platform that this session is for

player_id.title: Player Id
player_id.description: Player ID representing the current player

player_uuid.title: Player Uuid
player_uuid.description: Player UUID representing the current player

leader.title: Leader
leader.description: Is this player the leader of the platform session?  When setting up the parent session, if all players are from the same platform session, leadership is coordinated

platform_session_type.title: Platform Session Type
platform_session_type.description: Platform-Specific Identifier for the Platform's template

session_ids.title: Session Ids
session_ids.description: Sessions the player is currently a part of for this session type, if any.

pending_invites.title: Pending Invites
pending_invites.description: Pending invites, if any, for the current player in this session type

sessions.title: Sessions
sessions.description: Session associated with this player, and any pending invites

last_updated_timestamp.title: Time Zone Aware Datetime
last_updated_timestamp.description: Datetime that enforces that a timezone is given. Unix timestamps are allowed and forced into the UTC time zone

queue_id.title: Queue Id
queue_id.description: ID to uniquely identify this queue

active.title: Active
active.description: Flag for whether or not the queue is active, and can be joined or sessions created from it

ranking_type.title: Ranking Type
ranking_type.description: Which rank this queue should use MMR from to make matches from, and update at the end of match (1v1 MMR or 2v2 MMR for example)

num_sides.title: Num Sides
num_sides.description: The number of sides a game in this queue will have (2 in a 1v1 and 3 in a 1v1v1 for example

max_players_per_side.title: Max Players Per Side
max_players_per_side.description: The maximum number of players that can be on each team

min_players_per_side.title: Min Players Per Side
min_players_per_side.description: The minimum number of players that can be on each team

max_queue_group_size.title: Max Queue Group Size
max_queue_group_size.description: The maximum size of a group that can join this queue

match_making_template_group_id.title: Match Making Template Group Id
match_making_template_group_id.description: ID for which group of matchmaking templates/rules will be used when joining this queue

queue_id.title: Queue Id
queue_id.description: ID of the queue to join

additional_join_params.title: Additional Join Params
additional_join_params.description: Additional fields put on the matchmaking ticket for open match to search with (see https://openmatch.dev/site/docs/reference/api/#searchfields)

map_preferences.title: Map Preferences
map_preferences.description: List of map preferences in order from most desired, to least desired

ticket_id.title: Ticket Id
ticket_id.description: ID for the newly created match making ticket

sort_order.title: Sort Order
sort_order.description: The sorting priority order for this region

custom_only.title: Custom Only
custom_only.description: Indicates if the region is for custom games only

cursor.title: Cursor
cursor.description: Cursor to continue iterating through enabled regions. Non 0 cursor in the response means there are more regions. Pass the returned cursor up on a subsequent call to continue. A 0 cursor in the response means you have reached the end

status.description: Status that the player would like after the request is complete. Note that some join operations may promote the player from `member` to `leader`

client_settings.title: Client Settings
client_settings.description: Which input type and platform the client is using

team_id.title: Team Id
team_id.description: Which team the player is one

crossplay_preferences.title: Crossplay Preferences
crossplay_preferences.description: Client's desired crossplay settings to determine which other clients it can play with. If not defined, assumed to be as permissive as possible

session_id.title: Session Id
session_id.description: unique ID for this session within its type

instance.title: Instance
instance.description: Info about the current active instance for the session

match.title: Match
match.description: Info about the current match in the instance

matchmaking.title: Matchmaking
matchmaking.description: Info about the matchmaking state of the session, if it is in the process of matchmaking

browser.title: Browser
browser.description: Info about the browser state of the session

joinable.title: Joinable
joinable.description: Is this session freely joinable by players without an invite?

teams.title: Teams
teams.description: List of teams of players currently in the session

platform_session.title: Platform Session
platform_session.description: Child Platform Sessions for this session.  A player joining one of the child platform sessions implicitly joins the parent session

custom_data.title: Custom Data
custom_data.description: Leader Player or instance defined custom data about this session

created.title: Time Zone Aware Datetime
created.description: Datetime that enforces that a timezone is given. Unix timestamps are allowed and forced into the UTC time zone

region_id.title: Region Id
region_id.description: Preferred region for the instance and match to take place in

created_by_matchmaking.title: Created By Matchmaking
created_by_matchmaking.description: Flag of whether or not this session was created by matchmaking or not

event_code.title: Event Code
event_code.description: Code that identifies this type of event.  See CommonEventCode for common examples.

target_player_id.title: Target Player Id
target_player_id.description: Player who the event was targetted toward, if relevant

target_player_uuid.title: Target Player Uuid
target_player_uuid.description: Player who the event was targetted toward, if relevant

instance.title: Instance
instance.description: Instance that was active at the time of the event

match.title: Match
match.description: Match that was active at the time of the event

timestamp.title: Time Zone Aware Datetime
timestamp.description: Datetime that enforces that a timezone is given. Unix timestamps are allowed and forced into the UTC time zone

event_code.title: Event Code
event_code.description: Code that identifies this type of event.  See CommonEventCode for common examples.

timestamp.title: Time Zone Aware Datetime
timestamp.description: Datetime that enforces that a timezone is given. Unix timestamps are allowed and forced into the UTC time zone

events.title: Events
events.description: A list of the events that have occurred in a given session

session_id.title: Session Id
session_id.description: Session ID the player is now a part of

status.description: Status of the player in the session

inviting_player_uuid.title: Inviting Player Uuid
inviting_player_uuid.description: If the player is only a pending invite, this is the player that requested the invite

version.title: Version
version.description: Product Client Version number.  Used for compatibility checking with other players and instances

client_settings.title: Client Settings
client_settings.description: Which input type and platform the client is using

crossplay_preferences.title: Crossplay Preferences
crossplay_preferences.description: Client's desired crossplay settings to determine which other clients it can play with. If not defined, assumed to be as permissive as possible

invited.title: Time Zone Aware Datetime
invited.description: Datetime that enforces that a timezone is given. Unix timestamps are allowed and forced into the UTC time zone

joined.title: Time Zone Aware Datetime
joined.description: Datetime that enforces that a timezone is given. Unix timestamps are allowed and forced into the UTC time zone

status.description: Status that the player would like after the request is complete.  Note that some join operations may promote the player from `member` to `leader`

team_id.title: Team Id
team_id.description: Which team the player should be on

status.description: Status of the player after the request is completed

custom_data.title: Custom Data
custom_data.description: Resulting custom data about the player

max_size.title: Max Size
max_size.description: Maximum number of players allowed on this team

engine_session_type.title: Engine Session Type
engine_session_type.description: Engine identifier for sessions of this type.  For UE, this is commonly `Party` or `Game`.

can_join_matchmaking.title: Can Join Matchmaking
can_join_matchmaking.description: Are sessions of this type allowed to join matchmaking?

can_be_created_by_players_directly.title: Can Be Created By Players Directly
can_be_created_by_players_directly.description: Are players allowed to create sessions of this type?

joinable.title: Joinable
joinable.description: Should players join existing sessions of this type before creating a new one

auto_add_to_browser.title: Auto Add To Browser
auto_add_to_browser.description: Should session be automatically added to the browser list

auto_browser_params.title: Auto Browser Params
auto_browser_params.description: Browser parameters that can be used to filter results

can_be_added_to_server_browser.title: Can Be Added To Server Browser
can_be_added_to_server_browser.description: Are sessions of this type able to be added to the server browser by players?

keep_alive_on_empty.title: Keep Alive On Empty
keep_alive_on_empty.description: Should the session stay around, or be destroyed when the last player leaves it?

platform_templates.title: Platform Templates
platform_templates.description: Platform-Specific session mappings that are used to coordinate Rally Here sessions with OnlineSubsystem sessions

auto_startup_params.title: Auto Startup Params
auto_startup_params.description: Parameters used to start an instance for this session when it is created

min_session_count.title: Min Session Count
min_session_count.description: Minimum number of this type of session to be running at any given time per region.

num_teams.title: Num Teams
num_teams.description: The number of teams this session type can have

players_per_team.title: Players Per Team
players_per_team.description: The number of players that can be on each team

can_change_own_team.title: Can Change Own Team
can_change_own_team.description: Whether or not a player can change which team they are on. If true, they are able to. If False, they player's team can only be changed by an admin

templates.title: Templates
templates.description: Dictionary of SessionTemplates keyed on their template type

region_id.title: Region Id
region_id.description: Preferred region for the instance and match to take place in

custom_data.title: Custom Data
custom_data.description: Leader Player or instance defined custom data about this session

tags.name: Sessions
tags.description:
This API is for the creation and management of sessions, which are just generic groups of players, and operations
on those sessions, such as joining matchmaking.

tags.name: Queues
tags.description:
The queue endpoints are for requesting information and configuration about queues, instance launch templates, and
matchmaking profiles

tags.name: Regions
tags.description: Region endpoints for clients to request client visible regions and configuration around them
